name: Ultra Gravity Outer Space
description:
Submission for California Collegiate Game Jam 2022, themed science. 

A simple 3D third-person platformer collectathon- a low-scoped, game jam version recreation of some of the mechanics in Super Mario Galaxy. Collect teleporter parts to reach the end; collect scraps along the way. 

Eric Park: Designer, Programmer
Matthew Pickens: Designer, Programmer
Hunter Drummond: Designer, Programmer
Chase Taylor: Designer, Programmer
Ryan Chang: Programming Consultant
Jennifer Siino: Producer
Mason Do: Background Music

Special Thanks to Randen Banuelos
